title: Willing to pay 3months in advance
posting_body: I’m in need of a house for me and my 2 kids.
I have more than enough trade care of rent every month.
I need a 3 bedroom 2 bath house for rent.
I have a criminal background that doesn’t include sex, abuse, theft , or harming anyone in any way.
Just a little small things I’ve did 7 years ago keep popping up.
